visual.name: PowerBI-visuals-clustering-kmeans-1.0.4
visual.description:
Clustering helps you find similarity groups in your data, using well known k-means clustering algorithm. You can control the algorithm parameters to suit your needs.

Service prerequisites: R-powered custom visual is used in service seamlessly

Desktop prerequisites: To run R scripts in Power BI Desktop, you must separately install R on your local computer.
You can download and install R for free from the Revolution Open download page or the CRAN Repository

R package dependencies(auto-installed): nloptr, seriation, pbkrtest,NbClust, cluster, car, scales, fpc, mclust, apcluster, vegan, XML, plotly, htmlWidgets

Supports R versions: R 3.3.1, R 3.3.0, MRO 3.3.1, MRO 3.3.0
